maqras.text: Qasam ʙa in sahr! (Makka)
Va tu dar in sahr halol xohi sud
Va qasam ʙa padaru farzandoni u
ki odamiro, dar rancu mehnat ʙijofaridaem
Ojo mepindorad, ki kas ʙar u qodir nagardad
Megujad: «Mole farovonro xarc kardam!»
Ojo mepindorad, ki kase uro nadidaast
Ojo ʙaroi u du casm najofaridaem
Va jak zaʙonu du laʙ
Va du roh ʙa u dalolat nakardem
Va u dar on guzargohi saxt qadam nanihod
Va tu ci doni, ki guzargohi saxt cist
Ozod kardani ʙanda ast
jo ta'om dodan dar ruzi qahti
xosa ʙa jatime, ki xesovand ʙosad
jo ʙa miskine xoknisin (muhtoc)
Ba'd, az on az kasone ʙosad, ki imon ovardaand va jakdigarro ʙa saʙr vasijat kardaandu ʙa safqat
Inho ahli sa'odatand
Va kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Mo kofirand, ahli saqovatand (ʙadʙaxtijand)
Nasiʙi onhost otase, ki az har su saras pusidaast
Savgand ʙa oftoʙ va ravsanias ʙa hangomi cost
va savgand ʙa moh cun az pai on ʙarojad
va savgand, ʙa ruz, cun dunjoro ravsan kunad
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ruzro ʙipusad
va savgand ʙa osmonu on ki onro ʙino karda
va savgand ʙa zaminu on ki onro ʙigusturda
va savgand, ʙa nafsu on ki nekujas ʙijofarida
sipas ʙadihovu parhezgorihojasro ʙa u ilhom karda
ki har ki dar pokii nafs kusid, nacot joft
va har ki dar palidias kusid, zijon kard
Qavmi Samud az rui sarkasi duruƣ ʙarovardand
On goh ki ʙadʙaxttarinason ʙarxost
Pajomʙari Xudo ʙa onho guft, ki modasuturi Xudrro ʙo navʙati oʙi uro ʙiguzored
Uro duruƣ ʙarovardand va suturro kustand. Pas Parvardigorasoi ʙa saʙaʙi gunohasod ʙar sarason azoʙ ovard va ʙo xok jakson soxt
Va U az oqiʙati on nametarsad
Savgand ʙa saʙ, on goh ki cahonro ʙo torikias ʙipusad
va savgand ʙa ruz, on goh ki oskor savad
va savgand, ʙa on ki naru modaro ʙijofarid
ki hosili kusishoi sumo gunogun ast
Ammo kase, ki ʙaxsoisu parhezgori kard
va on ʙehtarinro tasdiq kard (kalimai tajiʙaro)
pas ʙaroi ʙihist omodaas mekunem
Ammo on kas ki ʙaxilivu ʙeehtijoci kard
va on ʙehtarinro takziʙ kard (duruƣ ʙarovard)
uro ʙaroi duzax omoda mesozem
Va cun halokas darrasad, doroijas ʙa holas foida naʙaxsad
Va on ci ʙar Most, rohnamoist
Va az oni Most on cahonu in cahon
Pas sumoro az otase, ki zaʙona mezanad, metarsonam
cuz ahli ʙadʙaxti ʙa on darnajaftad
on ki duruƣ ʙarovard va rujgardon sud
Va parhezgortarin mardumro az on dur dorand
on ki moli xud meʙaxsojad va poki mecujad
Va hec kasro ʙar (gardani) u haqqe naʙosad, ki aknun mukofot xohad
Ƣajri custani xusnudii Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙai xud
Va ʙa zudi xusnud savad
Savgand ʙa vaqti cost
va savgand ʙa saʙ, cun ʙipusad (ʙo torikii xud atrofro)
ki Parvardigorat turo tark nakarda va dusman ham nagiriftaast
Alʙatta oxirat ʙaroi tu ʙehtar az dunjost
Ba zudi Parvardigorat turo ato xohad dod, to xusnud savi
Ojo turo jatim najoft va panohat nadod
Va turo gumgasta joft va hidojatat kard
Va turo darves joft va tavongarat gardonid
Pas jatimro majozor
va gadoro maron
va az ne'mati Parvardigorat suxan ʙiguj
